channel.title: Box solver
channel.description: Are we ever going to make a new box solver? It looks like Pups box solver is a failure. Or am I going to have to attempt to make my own?

item.title: Box solver
item.dc:creator: @ruler ruler
item.description:
@ruler wrote:

ok i don’t know the proper solution but what if when the box is spinning is take shots lets say about 30 shots then process each looking for one with the side “flat”. Or if their a way to determins if its flat take a shot then check one color for a certain color at a spot and if that is true take 10 shots? then process each looking for it. a shot takes about 15ms. proably the same amount of time or less in the dll.

Read full topic

item.title: Box solver
item.dc:creator: @ruler ruler
item.description:
@ruler wrote:

[quote=“Bebemycat2, post:14, topic:7050”][quote author=ruler link=topic=9793.msg113784#msg113784 date=1154465366]

can we ty and keep it just in scar ?

The current box solver is a plugin, its its own program.
[/quote]

  1. It’s a .dll not a prgram
  2. The real box solver is in Antirandoms.Scar

Ruler, how are you making a “bot” that uses SRL if you don’t even know shit about SRL, try opening it and looking around once and a while.
Know what your talking about before you say it.[/quote]
the truth is I dont know scar that much. All i know are the basic functions kait gave you and from that i can see room for improvement. I wrote a obfuscator for the code true. But i havn’t read srl.

i am using information from srl like colors and bitmaps.

Read full topic

item.title: Box solver
item.dc:creator: @_DEAD *DEAD*
item.description:
@_DEAD wrote:

i know they are, thats why i have a new idea. a simple proggy, one that ive already made and am comtemplating whether sharing or not, that captures all the packets and sends them to another port. the real client still recieves the real packets, but a modified client gets the copied packets. so far it works, but i havent made it do anything useful yet. 100% undetectable, well as undetectable as a good scar program is, execpt better than scar because it will know where the coal, now the colour whatever it is.

Read full topic
